messages.subject: Re: my new blog!
messages.msgSnippet: Good luck on your new blog. I started mine in November and have really found it to be a great way to get thoughts out. ~ Joanne ~ Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna
messages.messageBody:
Good luck on your new blog. I started mine in November and have
really found it to be a great way to get thoughts out.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: my new blog!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Everyone, I just wanted to thank you all for the inspiration....I have been reading your blogs and they are really great, so I decided to try one out
messages.messageBody:
Hello Everyone,
I just wanted to thank you all for the
inspiration....I have been reading your blogs and they
are really great, so I decided to try one out myself.
I hope you like the first entry ....the picture was
the hardest part, but I think next time it won't take
so long!
Thank you again!
Peace,
Beth

http://6uvus.blogspot.com/
